descriptionlist.description: Complications brings Apple Watch widgets to your iPhone's lock screen. Each widget animates and refreshes beautifully throughout the day without sacrificing battery life. Get all the information you need at a glance. Tap on a widget to quickly open its app for even more information. Adjusting the x and y position allows you to move the widgets to fit your preferences. You can also choose the number of rows, columns and set the indentation of notifications..
